birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省台北市城中区
birth_place.en: Chengzhong District, Taipei, Taiwan Province, Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市松山区自由时代周刊杂志社
death_place.en: Freedom Era Weekly Magazine Office, Songshan District, Taipei, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 台湾社会运动倡议者、时事评论者、政治杂志出版人及持不同政见者。他主张争取全面的言论自由，支持台湾民主化，并致力推动台湾独立运动。1989年，因被控涉嫌叛乱而在警方攻坚拘捕时自焚身亡。
description.en: A Taiwanese social movement advocate, political commentator, magazine publisher, and dissident. He advocated for complete freedom of speech, supported Taiwan's democratization, and was dedicated to promoting the Taiwan independence movement. In 1989, he self-immolated when police broke in to arrest him on charges of sedition.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，郑南榕的妻子。在郑南榕自焚后，她投身政界，曾担任立法委员、交通部部长、行政院副院长等职。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and the wife of Cheng Nan-jung. After Cheng's self-immolation, she entered politics, serving as a Legislator, Minister of Transportation and Communications, and Vice Premier of the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕与叶菊兰的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Cheng Nan-jung and Yeh Chu-lan.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕的父亲，台湾日治时期从福州来台。
description.en: Father of Cheng Nan-jung, who came to Taiwan from Fuzhou during the period of Japanese rule.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕的母亲，闽南裔台湾人。
description.en: Mother of Cheng Nan-jung, a Taiwanese of Minnan descent.

description.zh-cn: 由郑南榕等人创办的台湾党外运动杂志，以“争取百分之百的自由”为口号，批评时政，挑战政治禁忌。
description.en: A Taiwanese tangwai movement magazine founded by Cheng Nan-jung and others. Its slogan was 'to fight for 100% freedom,' and it criticized contemporary politics and challenged political taboos.

description.zh-cn: 旨在追求台湾成为一个主权独立国家的政治运动，郑南榕是该运动的坚定支持者和推动者。
description.en: A political movement aiming for Taiwan to become a sovereign and independent state. Cheng Nan-jung was a staunch supporter and promoter of this movement.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的执政党，在动员戡乱时期实行一党专政，是郑南榕及其杂志《自由时代周刊》的主要批评对象。
description.en: The ruling party of the Republic of China, which enforced one-party rule during the Period of Mobilization for the Suppression of Communist Rebellion. It was the main target of criticism for Cheng Nan-jung and his magazine, Freedom Era Weekly.

en: Draft Constitution of the Republic of Taiwan

description.zh-cn: 由旅日法政学者许世楷撰写的宪法草案，因其主张台湾独立，《自由时代周刊》刊登后导致郑南榕被控叛乱。
description.en: A draft constitution written by the Japan-based legal and political scholar Hsu Shih-kai. Because it advocated for Taiwan's independence, its publication in Freedom Era Weekly led to Cheng Nan-jung being charged with sedition.

description.zh-cn: 台湾旅日法政学者，台湾独立建国联盟成员，《台湾共和国宪法草案》的撰写者。
description.en: A Taiwanese legal and political scholar based in Japan, a member of the World United Formosans for Independence, and the author of the 'Draft Constitution of the Republic of Taiwan'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任台北市警察局中山分局刑事组长，带队执行对郑南榕的拘捕行动。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, who was the head of the criminal investigation division of the Zhongshan Precinct of the Taipei City Police Department at the time. He led the police operation to arrest Cheng Nan-jung.

description.zh-cn: 台湾社会运动参与者，在郑南榕出殡游行期间，于总统府前自焚身亡，以示抗议。
description.en: A Taiwanese social movement participant who self-immolated in front of the Presidential Office Building during Cheng Nan-jung's funeral procession as a form of protest.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。2016年核定每年4月7日为“言论自由日”，以纪念郑南榕。
description.en: The highest administrative organ of the Republic of China. In 2016, it designated April 7th as 'Freedom of Expression Day' to commemorate Cheng Nan-jung.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国为纪念郑南榕舍身捍卫言论自由而设立的纪念日，定于其逝世日4月7日。
description.en: A commemorative day established by the Republic of China to honor Cheng Nan-jung's sacrifice in defense of freedom of speech, observed on April 7th, the anniversary of his death.

description.zh-cn: 台北市曾存在的行政区，为郑南榕的出生地。
description.en: A former administrative district of Taipei City, and the birthplace of Cheng Nan-jung.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台南市的国立大学，郑南榕曾在此就读工程科学系，后休学。
description.en: A national university in Tainan, Taiwan. Cheng Nan-jung studied in the Department of Engineering Science here before dropping out.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新北市的天主教大学，郑南榕曾在此就读哲学系，后转学。
description.en: A Catholic university in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Cheng Nan-jung studied in the Department of Philosophy here before transferring.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的国立大学，郑南榕曾在此就读哲学系，但因拒绝修读必修课《国父思想》而未能毕业。
description.en: A national university in Taipei, Taiwan. Cheng Nan-jung studied in the Department of Philosophy here but did not graduate because he refused to take the mandatory course 'Sun Yat-sen's Thought'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家、评论家和历史学家，其自由派思想影响了郑南榕。他也是《自由时代周刊》的共同创办人之一，担任总监。
description.en: A Taiwanese writer, commentator, and historian whose liberal ideas influenced Cheng Nan-jung. He was also a co-founder of Freedom Era Weekly, serving as its director.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。他是《自由时代周刊》的共同创办人之一，担任社长。也曾担任郑南榕的律师。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Republic of China. He was a co-founder of Freedom Era Weekly, serving as its publisher. He also acted as Cheng Nan-jung's lawyer.

description.zh-cn: 《自由时代周刊》的共同创办人之一，担任发行人。
description.en: One of the co-founders of Freedom Era Weekly, serving as its publisher.

description.zh-cn: 在国民党一党专政时期，非国民党籍政治人物所发起的一系列民主化运动，郑南榕是其中的重要人物。
description.en: A series of democratization movements initiated by non-Kuomintang politicians during the period of one-party rule. Cheng Nan-jung was a key figure in this movement.

en: Period of mobilization for the suppression of communist rebellion

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府在台湾实施的长期军事戒严时期，该时期的政治高压是郑南榕等党外运动人士抗争的主要背景。
description.en: A long period of martial law implemented by the ROC government in Taiwan. The political repression of this era was the primary context for the resistance of Tangwai movement activists like Cheng Nan-jung.

description.zh-cn: 台湾自由主义思想家，其著作对郑南榕产生重要影响。郑南榕在大学时期曾每周拜访当时遭软禁监视的殷海光。
description.en: A Taiwanese liberal thinker whose writings had a significant impact on Cheng Nan-jung. During his university years, Cheng visited Yin weekly while Yin was under house arrest and surveillance.

description.zh-cn: 由郑南榕等人发起的反戒严抗议活动，要求国民党政府废除长达36年的戒严令。
description.en: An anti-martial law protest initiated by Cheng Nan-jung and others, demanding the KMT government abolish the 36-year-long martial law decree.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府在台湾实施的长期戒严法令，是“519绿色行动”等民主运动所抗议的对象。
description.en: The long-term martial law decree implemented by the ROC government in Taiwan, which was the target of protest for democratic movements like the 'May 19 Green Action'.

description.zh-cn: 1947年发生在台湾的官民冲突与镇压事件，对郑南榕的家庭和思想产生深远影响。他后来积极投身于为该事件平反的运动。
description.en: A conflict and subsequent crackdown between officials and civilians in Taiwan in 1947, which had a profound impact on Cheng Nan-jung's family and ideology. He later actively engaged in movements to seek redress for the incident.

description.zh-cn: 由郑南榕、陈永兴、李胜雄等人共同创立的团体，旨在推动二二八事件的真相调查与平反工作。
description.en: An organization co-founded by Cheng Nan-jung, Chen Yung-hsing, and Lee Sheng-hsiung, aimed at promoting the investigation and redress of the February 28 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 台湾人权运动者，与郑南榕共同创立“二二八和平日促进会”并担任会长。
description.en: A Taiwanese human rights activist who co-founded the '228 Peace Day Promotion Association' with Cheng Nan-jung and served as its president.

description.zh-cn: 与郑南榕共同创立“二二八和平日促进会”并担任副会长。
description.en: Co-founded the '228 Peace Day Promotion Association' with Cheng Nan-jung and served as its vice president.

description.zh-cn: 由郑南榕和黄明宗等人共同推动的政治运动，旨在促进群众关心台湾发展，并建立新的国家认同。
description.en: A political movement jointly promoted by Cheng Nan-jung and Huang Ming-tsung, aimed at encouraging public concern for Taiwan's development and building a new national identity.

description.zh-cn: 台湾社会运动者，与郑南榕共同推动“台湾新国家运动”。
description.en: A Taiwanese social activist who jointly promoted the 'New Taiwan Nation Movement' with Cheng Nan-jung.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的检察机关，因郑南榕刊登《台湾共和国宪法草案》而以叛乱嫌疑对其发出传票，是导致其自囚并最终自焚的直接原因。
description.en: The prosecutorial agency of the Republic of China that issued a summons to Cheng Nan-jung on suspicion of sedition for publishing the 'Draft Constitution of the Republic of Taiwan', which directly led to his self-confinement and eventual self-immolation.

description.zh-cn: 由叶菊兰捐出杂志社房产和捐款成立的基金会，致力于纪念郑南榕并推广其理念。
description.en: A foundation established with the magazine's property and donations from Yeh Chu-lan, dedicated to commemorating Cheng Nan-jung and promoting his ideals.

description.zh-cn: 1990年发生于台湾的大规模学生运动，对台湾的民主化进程有重要影响。郑南榕的自焚事件在一定程度上激励了该运动的参与者。
description.en: A large-scale student movement in Taiwan in 1990 that had a significant impact on the country's democratization process. Cheng Nan-jung's self-immolation to some extent inspired the participants of this movement.

en: Constitution of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的根本大法。郑南榕认为，他主张台湾独立是受该宪法保障的言论自由的一部分。
description.en: The fundamental law of the Republic of China. Cheng Nan-jung argued that his advocacy for Taiwan's independence was part of the freedom of speech guaranteed by this constitution.

description.zh-cn: 基于孙中山思想的政治理论，在国民党执政时期被列为大学必修课程。郑南榕因拒绝选修此课而未能从国立台湾大学毕业。
description.en: A political theory based on the ideas of Sun Yat-sen, which was a mandatory university course during the KMT's rule. Cheng Nan-jung did not graduate from National Taiwan University because he refused to take this course.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕与叶菊兰于1972年2月公证结婚，两人育有一女郑竹梅。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung and Yeh Chu-lan were married in a civil ceremony in February 1972. They have one daughter, Cheng Chu-mei.

description.zh-cn: 郑竹梅是郑南榕与叶菊兰的女儿。
description.en: Cheng Chu-mei is the daughter of Cheng Nan-jung and Yeh Chu-lan.

description.zh-cn: 郑竹梅是郑南榕与叶菊兰的女儿。
description.en: Cheng Chu-mei is the daughter of Cheng Nan-jung and Yeh Chu-lan.

description.zh-cn: 郑木森是郑南榕的父亲。
description.en: Cheng Mu-sen is Cheng Nan-jung's father.

description.zh-cn: 谢惠琛是郑南榕的母亲。
description.en: Hsieh Hui-chen is Cheng Nan-jung's mother.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕于1947年9月12日出生于台北市城中区。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung was born in Chengzhong District, Taipei City on September 12, 1947.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕曾就读于国立成功大学工程科学系，后休学。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung studied in the Department of Engineering Science at National Cheng Kung University before dropping out.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕曾就读于天主教辅仁大学哲学系，后转学至台湾大学。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung studied in the Department of Philosophy at Fu Jen Catholic University before transferring to National Taiwan University.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕曾就读于国立台湾大学哲学系，因拒绝修读必修课程《国父思想》而未能毕业。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung studied in the Department of Philosophy at National Taiwan University but did not graduate because he refused to take the mandatory course 'Sun Yat-sen's Thought'.

description.zh-cn: 1984年3月12日，郑南榕与李敖、陈水扁、林世煜等人共同创办《自由时代周刊》杂志，郑南榕担任创办人。
description.en: On March 12, 1984, Cheng Nan-jung, along with Li Ao, Chen Shui-bian, and Lin Shih-yu, co-founded the Freedom Era Weekly magazine, with Cheng serving as the founder.

description.zh-cn: 1984年3月12日，李敖与郑南榕、陈水扁、林世煜等人共同创办《自由时代周刊》杂志，李敖担任总监。
description.en: On March 12, 1984, Li Ao, along with Cheng Nan-jung, Chen Shui-bian, and Lin Shih-yu, co-founded the Freedom Era Weekly magazine, with Li Ao serving as the director.

description.zh-cn: 1984年3月12日，陈水扁与郑南榕、李敖、林世煜等人共同创办《自由时代周刊》杂志，陈水扁担任社长。
description.en: On March 12, 1984, Chen Shui-bian, along with Cheng Nan-jung, Li Ao, and Lin Shih-yu, co-founded the Freedom Era Weekly magazine, with Chen Shui-bian serving as president.

description.zh-cn: 1984年3月12日，林世煜与郑南榕、李敖、陈水扁等人共同创办《自由时代周刊》杂志，林世煜担任发行人。
description.en: On March 12, 1984, Lin Shih-yu, along with Cheng Nan-jung, Li Ao, and Chen Shui-bian, co-founded the Freedom Era Weekly magazine, with Lin Shih-yu serving as the publisher.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕是台湾独立运动的坚定倡议者，并于1987年4月16日首次在公开演讲中高呼“我主张台湾独立”。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung was a staunch advocate for the Taiwan independence movement, and on April 16, 1987, he publicly shouted 'I advocate for Taiwan's independence' for the first time in a speech.

description.zh-cn: 1986年5月19日，郑南榕策划并发起了“519绿色行动”，公开要求解除戒严。
description.en: On May 19, 1986, Cheng Nan-jung planned and launched the 'May 19 Green Action,' publicly demanding the lifting of martial law.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕及其创办的《自由时代周刊》长期批评国民党的一党专政，是国民党政府的坚定反对者。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung and his magazine, Freedom Era Weekly, consistently criticized the Kuomintang's one-party rule, making him a staunch opponent of the KMT government.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕在大学期间深受自由主义思想家殷海光著作的影响，并曾每周前往拜访被软禁的殷海光。
description.en: During his university years, Cheng Nan-jung was deeply influenced by the writings of liberal thinker Yin Hai-kuang and visited the house-arrested Yin weekly.

description.zh-cn: 1988年12月10日，《自由时代周刊》刊登了许世楷撰写的《台湾共和国宪法草案》全文，此举直接导致郑南榕被控叛乱。
description.en: On December 10, 1988, Freedom Era Weekly published the full text of the 'Draft Constitution of the Republic of Taiwan' written by Hsu Shih-kai, an act that directly led to Cheng Nan-jung being charged with sedition.

description.zh-cn: 1989年1月21日，台湾高等法院检察署以涉嫌叛乱为由向郑南榕发出传票，郑南榕拒绝出庭并开始自囚，最终在警方攻坚时自焚身亡。
description.en: On January 21, 1989, the Taiwan High Prosecutors Office issued a summons to Cheng Nan-jung on suspicion of sedition. Cheng refused to appear in court, began his self-confinement, and ultimately self-immolated during a police raid.

description.zh-cn: 1989年4月7日，时任台北市警局中山分局刑事组长的侯友宜带队强行攻坚《自由时代周刊》杂志社以拘捕郑南榕，直接导致郑南榕自焚身亡。
description.en: On April 7, 1989, Hou Yu-ih, then head of the criminal investigation division of the Zhongshan Precinct, led a raid on the Freedom Era Weekly office to arrest Cheng Nan-jung, directly leading to Cheng's self-immolation.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕的自焚事件深刻影响了詹益桦。在郑南榕的出殡游行中，詹益桦亦自焚身亡以示抗议。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung's self-immolation profoundly influenced Chan I-hua. During Cheng's funeral procession, Chan also self-immolated as a form of protest.

description.zh-cn: 2016年12月，行政院核定将郑南榕逝世的4月7日定为“言论自由日”，以纪念其贡献。
description.en: In December 2016, the Executive Yuan approved the designation of April 7, the anniversary of Cheng Nan-jung's death, as 'Freedom of Expression Day' to commemorate his contribution.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，叶菊兰捐出杂志社房产和资金，成立了郑南榕基金会，以纪念其夫并推广言论自由理念。
description.en: In 1999, Yeh Chu-lan donated the magazine office property and funds to establish the Cheng Nan-jung Foundation to commemorate her husband and promote the ideal of freedom of speech.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕的自焚牺牲精神在一定程度上激励了1990年野百合学运的参与者，推动了台湾的民主化进程。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung's spirit of sacrifice through self-immolation inspired the participants of the 1990 Wild Lily student movement to some extent, advancing Taiwan's democratization process.

description.zh-cn: “519绿色行动”是一场旨在抗议并要求废除《台湾省戒严令》的群众集会。
description.en: The 'May 19 Green Action' was a mass rally aimed at protesting and demanding the abolition of the 'Taiwan Province Martial Law Order'.

description.zh-cn: 1987年2月，郑南榕与陈永兴、李胜雄等人共同创立“二二八和平日促进会”，推动平反二二八事件。
description.en: In February 1987, Cheng Nan-jung, along with Chen Yung-hsing and Lee Sheng-hsiung, co-founded the '228 Peace Day Promotion Association' to promote redress for the February 28 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 1987年2月，陈永兴与郑南榕、李胜雄等人共同创立“二二八和平日促进会”，陈永兴担任会长。
description.en: In February 1987, Chen Yung-hsing, along with Cheng Nan-jung and Lee Sheng-hsiung, co-founded the '228 Peace Day Promotion Association', with Chen serving as president.

description.zh-cn: 1987年2月，李胜雄与郑南榕、陈永兴等人共同创立“二二八和平日促进会”，李胜雄担任副会长。
description.en: In February 1987, Lee Sheng-hsiung, along with Cheng Nan-jung and Chen Yung-hsing, co-founded the '228 Peace Day Promotion Association', with Lee serving as vice president.

description.zh-cn: 1988年11月，郑南榕与黄明宗等人共同推动“台湾新国家运动”，在全岛进行巡回演讲与游行。
description.en: In November 1988, Cheng Nan-jung, along with Huang Ming-tsung and others, promoted the 'New Taiwan Nation Movement,' conducting speeches and marches across the island.

description.zh-cn: 1988年11月，黄明宗与郑南榕等人共同推动“台湾新国家运动”。
description.en: In November 1988, Huang Ming-tsung, along with Cheng Nan-jung and others, promoted the 'New Taiwan Nation Movement'.

description.zh-cn: 郑南榕因坚持不选修当时国民党政府规定的必修课程《国父思想》，而未能取得国立台湾大学的毕业证书。
description.en: Cheng Nan-jung was unable to obtain his graduation certificate from National Taiwan University because he insisted on not taking the mandatory course 'Sun Yat-sen's Thought,' which was required by the KMT government at the time.
